author: Scott Harris
title: Demetrious Johnson on Living in Shadow of U.S. Ground Zero for Coronavirus
description: Early March may feel as distant today as the second Ice Age, but Demetrious Johnson instantly recalls the moment he heard the news...
content:
Demetrious JohnsonKoji Sasahara/Associated Press
Early March may feel as distant today as the second Ice Age, but Demetrious Johnson instantly recalls the moment he heard the news.
More and more people were talking about an incurable disease called COVID-19… [+4720 chars]
